strong.deprecatedComment: Use sys.color.surface.default tokens instead with sys.color.surface.overlay.hover

stronger.description: Active state for segmented control, Pill

strong.deprecatedComment: Use sys.color.accent.muted.default token instead with sys.color.accent.overlay.hover

stronger.deprecatedComment: replace static.gold.stronger with {sys.color.static.amber.stronger}. Prefer to replace with `sys.color.bg.caution.stronger` if used as a background color.

default.deprecatedComment: replace static.orange.default with {sys.color.static.amber.default}. Prefer to replace with `sys.color.bg.caution.default` if used as a background color.

soft.deprecatedComment: replace static.orange.soft with {sys.color.static.amber.soft}. Prefer to replace with `sys.color.bg.caution.soft` if used as a background color.

strong.deprecatedComment: replace static.orange.strong with {sys.color.static.amber.strong}. Prefer to replace with `sys.color.bg.caution.strong` if used as a background color.
